2089720.name: Asian Maiden Creator
2089720.description:
Ever wanted to create a geisha? A Chinese empress? Or an Indian princess? Now you can with the Asian Maiden creator! Choose from tons of cute outfits and hairstyles to create your dream Asian-styled maiden!

Features


  • 9 Gorgeous Outfits
  • 7 Pretty Hairstyles
  • 6 Beautiful Accessories (facial veils and handheld items)
  • 10 Different facial expressions
  • Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
2089720.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
